title: Effectiveness of College Learning Tools: Application of Team Infomercial Assignments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Professional development program for in-service science teachers to strengthen job-related competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain real-world applications of scientific concepts through team-based infomercial production.
Learners can produce assignment deliverables while performing effective teamwork using online collaboration tools.
Learners can reflectively evaluate their learning outcomes and team project processes based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
